FullRoomEnterMessage: You have entered {roomName}. You entered from the {enterDirection}. {description} {directionsAvailable}
ShortRoomEnterMesssage: You have entered {roomName}. You entered from the {enterDirection}. {directionsAvailable}
RoomIsEntranceMessage: This is the entrance to the level.
RoomIsExitMessage: This is the exit to the level.
OneDirectionAvailableMessage: There is an exit to the {direction1}.
TwoDirectionsAvailableMessage: There are exits to the {direction1} and {direction2}.
ThreeDirectionsAvailableMessage: There are exits to the {direction1}, {direction2} and {direction3}.
FourDirectionsAvailableMessage: There are exits to the {direction1}, {direction2}, {direction3}, and {direction4}.
NoRoomsInDirectionMessage: There are no rooms in that direction.
InventoryListHeaderMessage: The items in your inventory are:
InventoryNoItemsMessage: You have no items in your inventory.
ItemAddedMessage: A {itemName} was added to your inventory. You now have {itemCount}.
BlockedByObstacleMessage: You cannot leave the room, an obstacle is in your way.
